ygData.subject: RE: Paw advice
ygData.msgSnippet: the mummy was on those stairs because he was trained.  He normally spawns on the third floor.  I dont know spawn times though ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
the mummy was on those stairs because he was trained. He normally spawns on
the third floor. I dont know spawn times though

-----Original Message-----
From: Sean.Stephen@... [mailto:Sean.Stephen@...]
Sent: Friday, September 03, 1999 10:34 AM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Paw advice


From: Sean.Stephen@...

So I have to wander the halls of befallen for all eternity then ? Or is
there a way of getting him to spawn ?

thanks,
Sean





"Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...> on 03/09/99 13:28:09

Please respond to EQ-Clerics@onelist.com

To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
cc: (bcc: Sean Stephen/UK/PSYGNOSIS)
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Paw advice




From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>

No it is not, the mummy roams on the upper levels, when I killed him he
was in the big rock stair that curves around and down.


On Fri, 3 Sep 1999 Sean.Stephen@... wrote:

> From: Sean.Stephen@...
>
> Hi,
> I am trying to get the Paw of Ophillia, Can someone tell me if the
> Named Mummy in Befallen who drops the Platinum ring spawns on the 3rd
level
> just inside the hidden wall or not ?
>
> Thanks,
>
> Seanie,
> 31st High Elf Cleric , bristlebane
